name: CATALYTIC REFORMING UNIT
des: Converts the desulfurized naphtha molecules into higher-octane molecules to produce reformate, which is a component of the end-product gasoline or petrol.

name: Isomerization unit
des: Converts linear molecules such as normal pentane into higher-octane branched molecules for blending into the end-product gasoline. Also used to convert linear normal butane into isobutene for use in the alkylation unit.

name: FLUID CATALYTIC CRACKING UNIT
des: Chemical coagulation, flocculation, sedimentation, filtration, and disinfection.

name: VISBREAKER UNIT
des: Upgrades heavy residual oils from the vacuum distillation unit by thermally cracking them into lighter, more valuable reduced viscosity products.
